name: explored
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
explore
B1 to search and discover (about something): to explore space The best way to explore the countryside is on foot. The children have gone exploring in the woods.
B2 to think or talk about something in order to find out more about it: Let's explore this issue/idea more fully.
More examplesFewer examplesDivers exploring the wreck managed to salvage some coins and jewellery.Nice is an excellent base for exploring the French Riviera.We went on an expedition to explore the flora and fauna of Hornchurch Wood.Virtual Reality aims to give us artificial worlds to explore, outside normal space and time.A website may have many different web pages for you to click on and explore.
